menu: We have beer, shots, wine, hotdrinks, munchies, dope, stuff
beer: We have bud, budlight, budice, miller, heineken
bud: #username# says pop a top again #after#. I think I'll have another round.
budlight: 1 for #after# and 1 for #username#. If your not wasted, the day is!
budice: #after# don't drink and drive u might spill your beer!
miller: Another please #bot#. Few more and I'll be living the "high" life ;)
heineken: #bot# hands #after# a beer, waste an hour. Teach a man to brew, and waste a lifetime!
shots: We have tequlia, whiskey, whisky, scotch, burbon, vodka, rum, vodka, water, milk
tequila: #bot# pours the shot thinking... 1 tequila, 2 tequila 3 tequila, floor.
whiskey: #bot# hands #after# a double shot and reflects... The water of life I haz it.
whisky: Bless the Maker and His water. Bless the coming and going of Him, may His passage cleanse the world.
scotch: Another round my friend, and one for #after#
burbon: #after# loosens tie and sighs... #bot# triple on the rocks if it does ya:)
vodka: Vodka is our enemy #after#, so we'll utterly consume it!
rum: You burned all the food, the shade? the rum! <#bot#> Yes the rum is gone, because it is a vile drink that turns even the most respectable men into complete faggetz. <#after#> But why is the rum gone?
water: #after# drink, feel the life and its beauty.
milk: This is angels' drink. #after# drink milk and have a cat nap.
red: #bot# sings red red wine you make me feel so fine...you keep me rocking all of the time, and hands #after# the glass
white: Hey #bot# once i drank a lil wine and it made me oh so fine. so keep em coming #bot# then we can dance and party all night
tea: My thoughts exactly! Come #after#, let us have some tea and continue to talk drama!
coffee: No one can understand the truth until he drinks of coffee's frothy goodness.
hotchoco: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
munchies: We have chips, pretzels, eggs, pizza, cheeseberger, taco, cookie, herring, duck, doughnut, hotdogs
chips: Hey #after#, betcha can't eat just one.
pretzels: #bot# places a bowl of pretzels on the bar.
eggs: hmmm pickled eggs and beer.. are ya sure;)
pizza: #bot# places a piping hot fully loaded pizza in front of #after# enjoy #after#
taco: #bot# dropped off by aliens, need taco #after#
cookie: #bot# pokes finger in #after# eye, #bot# changed to CookieMonster and steals cookie
herring: #bot# gives #after# a herring, you must cut down the mightiest tree in the forest... with... a herring!
duck: If you weighs the same as a duck... #after# made of wood... (and therefore) a witch!
doughnut: #bot# gives a doughnut and screams "EAAAT IT #after#, one more won't hurt, FAGGGOTT!"
hotdogs: Is the chemical aftertaste the reason why people eat hot dogs, or is it some kind of bonus?
dope: We have acid, blonde, lsd, lobotomy, heroine, weed, coke, trip, recommend, opium, cocaine, stoners, bong
acid: I want a big bag of meth!, #after# says."Okay." POOF, the bag appears! They prepare some thick long white lines and share it between the two of them.
blonde: Why do you snort artificial sweetener? < #after# > thought it was diet coke.
lsd: #bot# & #after# are sitting on the porch of their house, tripping on LSD. Suddenly, a firetruck races down the street, flashing its lights and howling its sirens. After it passes, #after# turns to #bot# and says, "Phew! Man, I thought he'd never go away!"
lobotomy: I prefer to have a bottle in front of me than a frontal lobotomy. ...
heroine: #after# you are like heroine. Even when your hurting me, I still need you.
weed: #after# do not drink and drive, smoke weed and fly!
coke: #after# tried sniffing Coke once, but the ice cubes got stuck in hiz nose.
trip: #after# take you all on a magical trip down the rabbit hole, rainbows, glitter, teqluia and 'special' cake.
recommend: #bot# wouldn't recommend sex, drugs or insanity for everyone, but they've always worked for #after#
opium: Thou #after# hast the keys of Paradise, oh, just, subtle, and mighty opium!
cocaine: #after# snorted enough cocaine last night to send Pablo Escobar's grandchildren to Harvard.
stoners: Stoners live and stoners die, and at the end they all get high, then soon the don't succeed, FUCK IT ALL LETS SMOKE SOME WEED!
stuff: We have bar, round, time, drunk, singalong, shop, slap, piss, potato, blame, tor, hate, hell, seatbelt, jesus, opinion, hail, smell
time: Time for another round. What'll it be boys & girls;)
drunk: You are drunk #after#. <#bot#> Yes, but your ugly, and in the morning I shall be sober!
singalong: We have 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer, #bot# takes one down....
shop: Please enter your card number #after#, after that your security number, email and password.
slap: #bot# slaps #after# around a bit with a large trout
potato: #after# mind is full of billions and billions of potato
blame: I don't like the blame game though in short, #after# is always to blame.
tor: If you think patience is a virtue, try surfing the net with Tor.
hate: I am free of all prejudices. I hate everyone equally.
hell: We are all going to hell, and #after# is driving the bus
seatbelt: The road to hell is a bumpy one, better buckle up
jesus: Jesus loves you #after#, everyone else thinks your an asshole!
opinion: YEAH, well ..., you know that's just like ..., ur opinion, #after#
hail: MANDATORY: Our Supreme Leader Speaks Today! ... All hail to Ur glorius leader #after#, he was right!! (All applause ...)
smell: #after# Is it my cologne? Maybe my zipper is down.
secret: We have porco, madonna, dio, bestemmia, soffro, tango
bestemmia: Mannaggia al sacro imene della Madonna
8 verticale: noto porco di tre lettere
Dio in un container pieno di riso: ogni chicco un porco
Per la salma di Woytila che puzza più della merda di Pinochet!
Madonna con la fica in fiamme che si inghiotte tutti i pali della luce
Madonnache dopo una bottiglia, un ratto e una melanzana non sa più cosa ficcarsi nella fica.
La Madonna è stata inseminata artificialmente…quindi Dio è un’alieno!
Mannaggia all’arcangelo che non s’è fatto i cazzi suoi!
Madonna sfiocinata in culo con la nerchia putrefatta di gesù e strafogata da mille capelle africane
Diosuperdotato come si gira si incula
Dio pezzetto bello grosso di cibo in una pozza di vomito
Madonna lepre, e Dio cane che la insegue
Gesù iscritto al CEPU, e segato agli esami
Dio con gli occhialetti da piscina in fondo alla fossa delle marianne
Dio che la butta in caciara con Mike Tyson e si accorge troppo tardi della sciocchezza
Dio lurido rigattiere di puttane minorenni
Dio nudo con le mani in tasca
Le palle di gesù scotennate da un plotone di ratti mutanti inculati dalla lingua della Madonna maiala
